videoSnippet.title: Not Today! || Akobian vs Nakamura || U.S. Championship (2019)
videoSnippet.description:
Follow me on Instagram for extra content https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Link to chess24 crosstable https://chess24.com/en/watch/live-tournaments/us-championship-2019/7/1/1

Varuzhan Akobian  vs Hikaru Nakamura
US Championship (2019), St Louis, MO USA, rd 7, Mar-27 
Queen's Pawn Opening (00)

1. d4 d6 2. Nf3 g6 3. c4 Bg7 4. Nc3 Nc6 5. d5 Ne5 6. Nxe5 Bxe5 7. e4 Nf6 8. Bd3 O-O 9. O-O e6 10. h3 exd5 11. cxd5 Nh5 12. f4 Bd4+ 13. Kh2 Qh4 14. Qe1 Qxe1 15. Rxe1 Bf2 16. Rf1 Bg3+ 17. Kg1 f5 18. Rf3 Bxf4 19. Bxf4 fxe4 20. Bxe4 Nxf4 21. Raf1 g5 22. h4 Bg4 23. Rg3 h5 24. hxg5 Rae8 25. Bf3 Re5 26. Bxg4 hxg4 27. Rxg4 Nxd5 28. Nxd5 Rxf1+ 29. Kxf1 Rxd5 30. Ke2 Kg7 31. Rc4 c6 32. Re4 Kg6 33. Re7 Rb5 34. b3 Kxg5 35. Rd7 d5 36. Kd3 Kf6 37. Kc3 a5 38. Rc7 Ke6 39. a3 d4+ 40. Kc4 d3 41. Kc3 d2 42. Kxd2 Rxb3 43. g4 a4 44. g5 Kd6 45. Rf7 b5 46. g6 Rxa3 47. g7 Rg3

The 2019 U.S. Championship is a 12-player round-robin featuring the strongest players in the USA, who compete for $194,000 in prize money as well as the coveted title of U.S. Champion. If two or more players tie for first place a playoff will be held.

For the 11th consecutive year the Saint Louis Chess Club is hosting the event. Players receive 90 minutes for the first 40 moves followed by 30 minutes for the rest of the game, with a 30-second increment from move one. Draw offers are not allowed before move 30. Official website: uschesschamps.com

To those of you who read the description: You are an excellent subscriber! :)
